commentList.content: "I recently stayed at the hotel in Beijing for two nights and I must say it was a fantastic experience! The location of the hotel was unbeatable, it was in the heart of the city and just a stone's throw away from the bustling Sanlitun shopping district and the convenient subway stations. The hotel itself was impeccably clean and had a cozy atmosphere that made me feel right at home. Although the rooms were small, they were very comfortable and the price was extremely reasonable. The staff were a highlight of my stay, they were extremely helpful and professional, making sure that all of my needs were met. During our stay, it was the Spring Festival, and the hotel went above and beyond by providing us with a delicious boxed breakfast that exceeded my expectations. The bathrooms were spotless and well equipped, including a smart toilet which added an extra level of luxury. The only improvement I would recommend is having some kind of closet or storage space for hanging jackets and clothes. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great stay in Beijing."

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

feedbackList.content: 感謝親愛的小主對CitiGO的信任和支持，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

commentList.content: 挺好，前天服務熱情，晚上有宵夜混沌，房間寬敞明亮，最主要逛街也方便
commentList.translatedContent: Very good, the service was warm the day before yesterday, there was a chaotic supper at night, the room was spacious and bright, and the main shopping was also convenient

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.content:

commentList.translatedContent:

feedbackList.content: 感謝親愛的小主對CitiGO的信任和支持，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and support to CitiGO, CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 住了兩晚 服務員非常熱情 春節前這幾天人不多 服務員還擔心我們早餐吃不飽送了我們一些雞蛋油條牛奶 真的很溫馨也很感謝 房間雖然不是太大但設施都很好 暖氣很足一點也不冷 智能馬桶乾淨又方便
commentList.translatedContent: Stayed for two nights and the waiter was very friendly. There were not many people these days before the Spring Festival. The waiter was worried that we would not have enough for breakfast and gave us some eggs and fritters. The milk is really warm and thankful. Although the room is not too big, the facilities are very good and the heating is sufficient. Not cold at all Smart toilet is clean and convenient

feedbackList.content: 感謝您的好評，得到您的認可是我們最大的榮幸，同時也給我們巨大的動力，讓我們在今後的服務中不斷提升、不斷創新，期待您的再次光臨，我們將竭誠為您服務！

commentList.content: 在酒店住了有一個月時間了，感受最深刻的就是家的味道。酒店開業時間不長，設施都很新，智能家居非常方便，洗衣房很方便，備有消毒液使用沒有顧慮。所有的工作人員服務態度都很好，有任何細微的問題都會耐心地幫助客人解決。酒店位置屬三裏屯但挺安靜，離太古裏走個三分鐘左右就能到。太多細節值得表揚，不多描述。推薦大家入住。
commentList.translatedContent: I have lived in the hotel for a month, and the most profound feeling is the taste of home. The hotel has not been open for a long time, the facilities are very new, the smart home is very convenient, the laundry room is very convenient, and there is no need to worry about the use of disinfectant. All the staff have a very good service attitude and will patiently help customers to solve any minor problems. The location of the hotel is in Sanlitun but it is very quiet. It takes about three minutes to walk from Taikoo Li. Too many details to be commended, too few to describe. Recommend everyone to stay.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，如果下次入住，可提前致電前台，幫您保留一間隔音較好的房間，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience. If you stay next time, you can call the front desk in advance to help you reserve a room with better sound insulation, and look forward to your next stay!

commentList.content: 簡單精緻的酒店，距離使館區很近走路就可以到達。酒店設備很新，房間乾淨整潔，雖然不大，但是裝修的比較高級，設施都是嵌入式的，節省空間。馬桶是加熱的，窗帘是自動的。很滿意的一次。
commentList.translatedContent: Simple and sophisticated hotel, just a short walk from the embassy district. The hotel equipment is very new, the room is clean and tidy, although it is not big, but the decoration is relatively advanced, the facilities are embedded, saving space. The toilet is heated and the curtains are automatic. Very satisfied once.

🍃 Environment: Good

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
